update graduate_history
date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
graduate_num = #{graduateNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
employed_num = #{employedNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

modify_user = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
